price: ក្រោយមកយើងបានប្រោសពួកអ្នកឱ្យរស់ឡើងវិញបន្ទាប់ពីការស្លាប់របស់ពួកអ្នកដើម្បីឱ្យពួកអ្នកដឹងគុណ។
arabic: ثُمَّ بَعَثۡنَٰكُم مِّنۢ بَعۡدِ مَوۡتِكُمۡ لَعَلَّكُمۡ تَشۡكُرُونَ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: thumma baʿathnākum min baʿdi mawtikum laʿallakum tashkurūna
